name: tasit-sdk
description: A JavaScript SDK for making mobile Ethereum dapps using React Native
author: Tasit Labs

scripts.test:local: npm run lint && npx mocha src/*.test.js --exclude src/*forkedRopsten.test.js --require @babel/register --file src/testHelpers/mochaSetup.js
scripts.test:forkedRopsten: npm run lint && npx mocha src/*forkedRopsten.test.js --require @babel/register --file src/testHelpers/mochaSetup.js  --no-timeouts
